Title: Diverse Shelters
Description:
A mod that is a port from the previous version called Better Shelters, it changes the visuals of all shelters in vanilla regions this also includes the new regions added by Downpour.

Contains colored pearls

Note 1: Stay still for a while if you are not using OSHA Complaint Shelter to make it close (Might need to hold down to hibernate).

Note 2: It is recommended hold down if you are using OSHA Complaint Shelter, it is no longer a requirement to play  the mod  withDiverse Shelters.

Note 3: Some shelters in Outer Expanse weren't changed because those are already big/unique, and another one that does have missing files, making it unavailable to modify.

P.D: Thanks to Bro for helping fixing some issues related to world editing.

If you find any issues with the mod, you can report them in the discussion Bug Reports and i will try my best to fix it.
